I specialize in graphic design, UI/UX and photography

I Specialize In

Photography as well as creating digital masterpieces and UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications

Concepting

Think, believe, feel before you start something. That is the way to get what you are after.

UI/UX

Design should be “invisible”: Users shouldn’t focus on it but on completing tasks

Visual Design

Visual design is about more than aesthetics. Placing elements carefully to create interfaces that optimize user experience and drive conversion.

Interaction

The idea of a two-way effect is essential in the concept of interaction, as opposed to a one-way causal effect.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Let's talk and see what we can do to get your project running

2

Brainstorming

We should schedule couple of sessions to talk a look at your product from different angles and perspectives.

3

UI/UX Planing

Once we know what are we up to, it's time for a plan.

4

Interaction

No matter at what stage we are, if you think we should hit a fresh start. Let's do it!
